Summary: bright white quiet, and traveling slow.
divs: sighting detailsfirst noticed as a reflection in front door window. turned to look at it and it was bright white traveling very slow. it appeared to be cigar shaped. my husband went and got a telescope. he said he thought it might have some very small wings, but could not tell for sure. we were watching some local sky divers, and plane flying in the area. what ever this was the plane , and sky divers didn't see it or wasn't aware of it. it seemed to be flying at the same level as the plane. we thought it was strange to be flying at the same time. we thought it might be a drone looking for marijuana.....just a thought? we didn't have a camera at the time so no pictures. we have been looking for answers, and no one seems to have them. thank you for letting us share this with you. we don't know what we saw but would love to know. sincerly *(names of witnesses deleted--cms\sg).
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Harbor Springs
There were no other sightings in Harbor Springs on or around October 17th 2010
